### [973] [A Framework Leveraging Large Language Models for Autonomous UAV Control in Flying Networks](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04404)
*Diana Nunes,Ricardo Amorim,Pedro Ribeiro,André Coelho,Rui Campos*

Main category: cs.NI

TL;DR: FLUC是一个模块化框架，将开源大语言模型（LLMs）与无人机（UAV）自动驾驶系统集成，实现飞行网络（FNs）中的自主控制。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 通过自然语言命令直接控制无人机，减少操作者意图与无人机行为之间的差距。

Method: FLUC将高级自然语言命令翻译为可执行的无人机任务代码，并评估了三种开源LLMs（Qwen 2.5、Gemma 2和LLaMA 3.2）在代码生成和任务规划中的表现。

Result: Qwen 2.5在多步推理中表现最佳，Gemma 2在准确性和延迟之间取得平衡，LLaMA 3.2响应更快但逻辑一致性较低。案例研究验证了FLUC在实时任务驱动控制中的有效性。

Conclusion: FLUC能够有效解析结构化提示并自主执行特定领域逻辑，适用于实时任务驱动的无人机控制。

Abstract: This paper proposes FLUC, a modular framework that integrates open-source
Large Language Models (LLMs) with Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (UAV) autopilot
systems to enable autonomous control in Flying Networks (FNs). FLUC translates
high-level natural language commands into executable UAV mission code, bridging
the gap between operator intent and UAV behaviour.
  FLUC is evaluated using three open-source LLMs - Qwen 2.5, Gemma 2, and LLaMA
3.2 - across scenarios involving code generation and mission planning. Results
show that Qwen 2.5 excels in multi-step reasoning, Gemma 2 balances accuracy
and latency, and LLaMA 3.2 offers faster responses with lower logical
coherence. A case study on energy-aware UAV positioning confirms FLUC's ability
to interpret structured prompts and autonomously execute domain-specific logic,
showing its effectiveness in real-time, mission-driven control.

</details>


### [974] [BEAR: BGP Event Analysis and Reporting](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04514)
*Hanqing Li,Melania Fedeli,Vinay Kolar,Diego Klabjan*

Main category: cs.NI

TL;DR: BEAR是一个利用大型语言模型（LLM）自动生成BGP异常事件报告的框架，提高了检测结果的解释性和分析精度。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: BGP异常（如路由泄漏和劫持）威胁网络可靠性和安全性，现有方法依赖专家知识，BEAR旨在自动化解释和报告。

Method: BEAR通过多步推理将表格BGP数据转化为详细文本叙述，并利用LLM生成合成数据以弥补公开数据不足。

Result: 在真实和合成数据集上，BEAR达到100%准确率，优于其他基线方法。

Conclusion: BEAR开创了自动化解释BGP异常事件的先河，为网络管理提供了有价值的操作见解。

Abstract: The Internet comprises of interconnected, independently managed Autonomous
Systems (AS) that rely on the Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) for inter-domain
routing. BGP anomalies--such as route leaks and hijacks--can divert traffic
through unauthorized or inefficient paths, jeopardizing network reliability and
security. Although existing rule-based and machine learning methods can detect
these anomalies using structured metrics, they still require experts with
in-depth BGP knowledge of, for example, AS relationships and historical
incidents, to interpret events and propose remediation. In this paper, we
introduce BEAR (BGP Event Analysis and Reporting), a novel framework that
leverages large language models (LLMs) to automatically generate comprehensive
reports explaining detected BGP anomaly events. BEAR employs a multi-step
reasoning process that translates tabular BGP data into detailed textual
narratives, enhancing interpretability and analytical precision. To address the
limited availability of publicly documented BGP anomalies, we also present a
synthetic data generation framework powered by LLMs. Evaluations on both real
and synthetic datasets demonstrate that BEAR achieves 100% accuracy,
outperforming Chain-of-Thought and in-context learning baselines. This work
pioneers an automated approach for explaining BGP anomaly events, offering
valuable operational insights for network management.

</details>


### [975] [Intelligent Channel Allocation for IEEE 802.11be Multi-Link Operation: When MAB Meets LLM](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04594)
*Shumin Lian,Jingwen Tong,Jun Zhang,Liqun Fu*

Main category: cs.NI

TL;DR: 论文提出了一种动态信道分配算法BAI-MCTS及其改进版LLM-BAI-MCTS，用于解决WiFi 7网络中多链路操作（MLO）的信道分配问题，显著提升了收敛速度和性能。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: WiFi 7的MLO功能在密集网络环境中面临信道分配挑战，现有研究多关注静态网络性能优化，缺乏动态环境下的解决方案。

Method: 将问题建模为组合优化问题，采用多臂老虎机（MAB）框架进行在线学习，提出了BAI-MCTS算法，并进一步结合大型语言模型（LLM）提出LLM-BAI-MCTS。

Result: BAI-MCTS算法收敛速度比现有算法快50.44%，LLM-BAI-MCTS在密集网络中收敛速度提升63.32%。

Conclusion: BAI-MCTS和LLM-BAI-MCTS算法有效解决了动态信道分配问题，显著提升了网络性能。

Abstract: WiFi networks have achieved remarkable success in enabling seamless
communication and data exchange worldwide. The IEEE 802.11be standard, known as
WiFi 7, introduces Multi-Link Operation (MLO), a groundbreaking feature that
enables devices to establish multiple simultaneous connections across different
bands and channels. While MLO promises substantial improvements in network
throughput and latency reduction, it presents significant challenges in channel
allocation, particularly in dense network environments. Current research has
predominantly focused on performance analysis and throughput optimization
within static WiFi 7 network configurations. In contrast, this paper addresses
the dynamic channel allocation problem in dense WiFi 7 networks with MLO
capabilities. We formulate this challenge as a combinatorial optimization
problem, leveraging a novel network performance analysis mechanism. Given the
inherent lack of prior network information, we model the problem within a
Multi-Armed Bandit (MAB) framework to enable online learning of optimal channel
allocations. Our proposed Best-Arm Identification-enabled Monte Carlo Tree
Search (BAI-MCTS) algorithm includes rigorous theoretical analysis, providing
upper bounds for both sample complexity and error probability. To further
reduce sample complexity and enhance generalizability across diverse network
scenarios, we put forth LLM-BAI-MCTS, an intelligent algorithm for the dynamic
channel allocation problem by integrating the Large Language Model (LLM) into
the BAI-MCTS algorithm. Numerical results demonstrate that the BAI-MCTS
algorithm achieves a convergence rate approximately $50.44\%$ faster than the
state-of-the-art algorithms when reaching $98\%$ of the optimal value. Notably,
the convergence rate of the LLM-BAI-MCTS algorithm increases by over $63.32\%$
in dense networks.

</details>


### [976] [Towards Network Data Analytics in 5G Systems and Beyond](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04860)
*Marcos Lima Romero,Ricardo Suyama*

Main category: cs.NI

TL;DR: 论文探讨了移动网络运营商（MNOs）如何利用数据分析提升价值，并分析了3GPP的NWDAF功能在学术研究中的局限性和潜力。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 移动网络运营商的数据利用不足，而OTT企业却主导市场价值。数据分析被视为提升服务价值和效率的关键。

Method: 分析了70多篇文献，识别趋势和差距，并提出了两个新的NWDAF应用案例。

Result: 研究发现学术研究集中于有限方法和案例，提出了扩展NWDAF应用的建议。

Conclusion: 通过探索NWDAF的潜力，可以促进其采用并实现数据货币化。

Abstract: Data has become a critical asset in the digital economy, yet it remains
underutilized by Mobile Network Operators (MNOs), unlike Over-the-Top (OTT)
players that lead global market valuations. To move beyond the commoditization
of connectivity and deliver greater value to customers, data analytics emerges
as a strategic enabler. Using data efficiently is essential for unlocking new
service opportunities, optimizing operational efficiency, and mitigating
operational and business risks. Since Release 15, the 3rd Generation
Partnership Project (3GPP) has introduced the Network Data Analytics Function
(NWDAF) to provide powerful insights and predictions using data collected
across mobile networks, supporting both user-centric and network-oriented use
cases. However, academic research has largely focused on a limited set of
methods and use cases, driven by the availability of datasets, restricting
broader exploration. This study analyzes trends and gaps in more than 70
articles and proposes two novel use cases to promote the adoption of NWDAF and
explore its potential for monetization.

</details>


### [977] [A Framework Leveraging Large Language Models for Autonomous UAV Control in Flying Networks](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04404)
*Diana Nunes,Ricardo Amorim,Pedro Ribeiro,André Coelho,Rui Campos*

Main category: cs.NI

TL;DR: FLUC是一个模块化框架，将开源大语言模型（LLM）与无人机自动驾驶系统集成，实现飞行网络（FN）中的自主控制。

Conclusion: FLUC能够成功解析结构化提示并自主执行领域特定逻辑，展示了其在无人机自主控制中的实用性和潜力。

Abstract: This paper proposes FLUC, a modular framework that integrates open-source

3.2 - across scenarios involving code generation and mission planning. Results

showing its effectiveness in real-time, mission-driven control.

</details>


### [978] [BEAR: BGP Event Analysis and Reporting](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04514)
*Hanqing Li,Melania Fedeli,Vinay Kolar,Diego Klabjan*

Main category: cs.NI

TL;DR: BEAR是一个利用大型语言模型（LLM）自动生成BGP异常事件报告的框架，提高了事件解释的准确性和可操作性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: BGP异常（如路由泄露和劫持）威胁网络可靠性和安全，现有方法依赖专家知识，难以自动化解释和修复。

Method: BEAR通过多步推理将表格数据转化为文本叙述，并利用LLM生成合成数据以弥补公开数据不足。

Result: 在真实和合成数据集上，BEAR准确率达100%，优于基线方法。

Conclusion: BEAR为BGP异常事件提供了自动化解释工具，提升了网络管理的效率和精确性。

Systems (AS) that rely on the Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) for inter-domain
routing. BGP anomalies--such as route leaks and hijacks--can divert traffic
through unauthorized or inefficient paths, jeopardizing network reliability and
security. Although existing rule-based and machine learning methods can detect
these anomalies using structured metrics, they still require experts with
in-depth BGP knowledge of, for example, AS relationships and historical
incidents, to interpret events and propose remediation. In this paper, we
introduce BEAR (BGP Event Analysis and Reporting), a novel framework that
leverages large language models (LLMs) to automatically generate comprehensive
reports explaining detected BGP anomaly events. BEAR employs a multi-step
reasoning process that translates tabular BGP data into detailed textual
narratives, enhancing interpretability and analytical precision. To address the
limited availability of publicly documented BGP anomalies, we also present a
synthetic data generation framework powered by LLMs. Evaluations on both real
and synthetic datasets demonstrate that BEAR achieves 100% accuracy,
outperforming Chain-of-Thought and in-context learning baselines. This work
pioneers an automated approach for explaining BGP anomaly events, offering
valuable operational insights for network management.

</details>


### [979] [Intelligent Channel Allocation for IEEE 802.11be Multi-Link Operation: When MAB Meets LLM](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04594)
*Shumin Lian,Jingwen Tong,Jun Zhang,Liqun Fu*

Main category: cs.NI

TL;DR: 论文提出了一种动态信道分配算法BAI-MCTS及其改进版LLM-BAI-MCTS，用于解决WiFi 7网络中多链路操作（MLO）的信道分配问题，显著提升了收敛速度和性能。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: WiFi 7的MLO功能在密集网络环境中面临信道分配的挑战，现有研究多关注静态网络配置，本文旨在解决动态信道分配问题。

Method: 将问题建模为组合优化问题，采用MAB框架进行在线学习，提出BAI-MCTS算法及结合LLM的改进版LLM-BAI-MCTS。

Result: BAI-MCTS的收敛速度比现有算法快50.44%，LLM-BAI-MCTS在密集网络中收敛速度提升63.32%。

Conclusion: BAI-MCTS和LLM-BAI-MCTS算法有效解决了动态信道分配问题，显著提升了网络性能。

Abstract: WiFi networks have achieved remarkable success in enabling seamless
communication and data exchange worldwide. The IEEE 802.11be standard, known as
WiFi 7, introduces Multi-Link Operation (MLO), a groundbreaking feature that
enables devices to establish multiple simultaneous connections across different
bands and channels. While MLO promises substantial improvements in network
throughput and latency reduction, it presents significant challenges in channel
allocation, particularly in dense network environments. Current research has
predominantly focused on performance analysis and throughput optimization
within static WiFi 7 network configurations. In contrast, this paper addresses
the dynamic channel allocation problem in dense WiFi 7 networks with MLO
capabilities. We formulate this challenge as a combinatorial optimization
problem, leveraging a novel network performance analysis mechanism. Given the
inherent lack of prior network information, we model the problem within a
Multi-Armed Bandit (MAB) framework to enable online learning of optimal channel
allocations. Our proposed Best-Arm Identification-enabled Monte Carlo Tree
Search (BAI-MCTS) algorithm includes rigorous theoretical analysis, providing
upper bounds for both sample complexity and error probability. To further
reduce sample complexity and enhance generalizability across diverse network
scenarios, we put forth LLM-BAI-MCTS, an intelligent algorithm for the dynamic
channel allocation problem by integrating the Large Language Model (LLM) into
the BAI-MCTS algorithm. Numerical results demonstrate that the BAI-MCTS
algorithm achieves a convergence rate approximately $50.44\%$ faster than the
state-of-the-art algorithms when reaching $98\%$ of the optimal value. Notably,
the convergence rate of the LLM-BAI-MCTS algorithm increases by over $63.32\%$
in dense networks.

</details>


### [980] [Towards Network Data Analytics in 5G Systems and Beyond](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04860)
*Marcos Lima Romero,Ricardo Suyama*

Main category: cs.NI

TL;DR: 论文分析了移动网络运营商（MNOs）如何通过数据分析和NWDAF提升价值，并提出了两个新用例以推动其应用和商业化。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 移动网络运营商的数据利用不足，而OTT玩家主导市场价值。通过数据分析和NWDAF，可以超越连接服务，创造更大价值。

Method: 分析了70多篇文章的趋势和差距，并提出了两个新用例。

Result: 揭示了学术研究的局限性，并展示了NWDAF在服务优化和商业化中的潜力。

Conclusion: NWDAF是提升移动网络运营商价值的关键工具，未来需更多探索其应用和商业化路径。

Abstract: Data has become a critical asset in the digital economy, yet it remains
underutilized by Mobile Network Operators (MNOs), unlike Over-the-Top (OTT)
players that lead global market valuations. To move beyond the commoditization
of connectivity and deliver greater value to customers, data analytics emerges
as a strategic enabler. Using data efficiently is essential for unlocking new
service opportunities, optimizing operational efficiency, and mitigating
operational and business risks. Since Release 15, the 3rd Generation
Partnership Project (3GPP) has introduced the Network Data Analytics Function
(NWDAF) to provide powerful insights and predictions using data collected
across mobile networks, supporting both user-centric and network-oriented use
cases. However, academic research has largely focused on a limited set of
methods and use cases, driven by the availability of datasets, restricting
broader exploration. This study analyzes trends and gaps in more than 70
articles and proposes two novel use cases to promote the adoption of NWDAF and
explore its potential for monetization.

</details>

### [981] [SSIMBaD: Sigma Scaling with SSIM-Guided Balanced Diffusion for AnimeFace Colorization](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04283)
*Junpyo Seo,Hanbin Koo,Jieun Yook,Byung-Ro Moon*

Main category: cs.GR

TL;DR: 提出了一种基于扩散模型的动漫风格面部线稿自动上色方法，通过SSIMBaD技术实现更平衡和忠实重建。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统方法依赖预定义的噪声调度，可能导致感知一致性不足，因此需要一种更有效的方法。

Method: 采用连续时间扩散模型，引入SSIMBaD技术，通过sigma空间变换对齐感知退化。

Result: 在大规模动漫面部数据集上，该方法在像素精度和感知质量上均优于现有模型。

Conclusion: SSIMBaD框架在保持结构保真度的同时，能有效传递风格属性，适用于多样化风格。

Abstract: We propose a novel diffusion-based framework for automatic colorization of
Anime-style facial sketches. Our method preserves the structural fidelity of
the input sketch while effectively transferring stylistic attributes from a
reference image. Unlike traditional approaches that rely on predefined noise
schedules - which often compromise perceptual consistency -- our framework
builds on continuous-time diffusion models and introduces SSIMBaD (Sigma
Scaling with SSIM-Guided Balanced Diffusion). SSIMBaD applies a sigma-space
transformation that aligns perceptual degradation, as measured by structural
similarity (SSIM), in a linear manner. This scaling ensures uniform visual
difficulty across timesteps, enabling more balanced and faithful
reconstructions. Experiments on a large-scale Anime face dataset demonstrate
that our method outperforms state-of-the-art models in both pixel accuracy and
perceptual quality, while generalizing to diverse styles. Code is available at
github.com/Giventicket/SSIMBaD-Sigma-Scaling-with-SSIM-Guided-Balanced-Diffusion-for-AnimeFace-Colorization

</details>


### [982] [Handle-based Mesh Deformation Guided By Vision Language Model](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04562)
*Xingpeng Sun,Shiyang Jia,Zherong Pan,Kui Wu,Aniket Bera*

Main category: cs.GR

TL;DR: 提出一种无需训练、基于手柄的网格变形方法，利用视觉语言模型（VLM）通过提示工程实现高质量变形。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有网格变形方法存在输出质量低、需手动调整或依赖数据训练的问题，需改进。

Method: 结合锥形奇点检测和VLM提示工程，通过多视角投票减少不确定性。

Result: 在多个基准测试中，方法更符合用户意图，且变形失真低。

Conclusion: 该方法无需训练、自动化程度高，能稳定生成高质量网格变形。

Abstract: Mesh deformation is a fundamental tool in 3D content manipulation. Despite
extensive prior research, existing approaches often suffer from low output
quality, require significant manual tuning, or depend on data-intensive
training. To address these limitations, we introduce a training-free,
handle-based mesh deformation method. % Our core idea is to leverage a
Vision-Language Model (VLM) to interpret and manipulate a handle-based
interface through prompt engineering. We begin by applying cone singularity
detection to identify a sparse set of potential handles. The VLM is then
prompted to select both the deformable sub-parts of the mesh and the handles
that best align with user instructions. Subsequently, we query the desired
deformed positions of the selected handles in screen space. To reduce
uncertainty inherent in VLM predictions, we aggregate the results from multiple
camera views using a novel multi-view voting scheme. % Across a suite of
benchmarks, our method produces deformations that align more closely with user
intent, as measured by CLIP and GPTEval3D scores, while introducing low
distortion -- quantified via membrane energy. In summary, our approach is
training-free, highly automated, and consistently delivers high-quality mesh
deformations.

</details>


### [983] [VoxDet: Rethinking 3D Semantic Occupancy Prediction as Dense Object Detection](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04623)
*Wuyang Li,Zhu Yu,Alexandre Alahi*

Main category: cs.GR

TL;DR: 论文提出了一种实例为中心的3D语义占用预测方法VoxDet，通过将体素级分类任务解耦为偏移回归和语义预测，显著提升了实例级完整性和准确性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有方法将3D语义占用预测视为密集分割任务，忽视了实例级的判别性，导致实例不完整和相邻模糊。论文发现体素级标签隐含实例级信息，并利用这一观察提出新方法。

Method: 提出VoxDet框架，包括：(a)空间解耦体素编码器生成任务特定特征，(b)任务解耦密集预测器，通过偏移回归和语义预测实现实例感知预测。

Result: VoxDet在相机和LiDAR输入上均表现优异，在SemanticKITTI测试集上达到63.0 IoU，排名第一。

Conclusion: VoxDet通过实例中心化设计，显著提升了3D语义占用预测的性能和效率。

Abstract: 3D semantic occupancy prediction aims to reconstruct the 3D geometry and
semantics of the surrounding environment. With dense voxel labels, prior works
typically formulate it as a dense segmentation task, independently classifying
each voxel. However, this paradigm neglects critical instance-centric
discriminability, leading to instance-level incompleteness and adjacent
ambiguities. To address this, we highlight a free lunch of occupancy labels:
the voxel-level class label implicitly provides insight at the instance level,
which is overlooked by the community. Motivated by this observation, we first
introduce a training-free Voxel-to-Instance (VoxNT) trick: a simple yet
effective method that freely converts voxel-level class labels into
instance-level offset labels. Building on this, we further propose VoxDet, an
instance-centric framework that reformulates the voxel-level occupancy
prediction as dense object detection by decoupling it into two sub-tasks:
offset regression and semantic prediction. Specifically, based on the lifted 3D
volume, VoxDet first uses (a) Spatially-decoupled Voxel Encoder to generate
disentangled feature volumes for the two sub-tasks, which learn task-specific
spatial deformation in the densely projected tri-perceptive space. Then, we
deploy (b) Task-decoupled Dense Predictor to address this task via dense
detection. Here, we first regress a 4D offset field to estimate distances (6
directions) between voxels and object borders in the voxel space. The regressed
offsets are then used to guide the instance-level aggregation in the
classification branch, achieving instance-aware prediction. Experiments show
that VoxDet can be deployed on both camera and LiDAR input, jointly achieving
state-of-the-art results on both benchmarks. VoxDet is not only highly
efficient, but also achieves 63.0 IoU on the SemanticKITTI test set, ranking
1st on the online leaderboard.

</details>


### [984] [A Fast Unsupervised Scheme for Polygonal Approximation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04664)
*Bimal Kumar Ray*

Main category: cs.GR

TL;DR: 提出了一种快速且无监督的多边形近似闭合数字曲线的方案，速度快于现有方法，且在Rosin度量与美观性上表现优异。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有方法在速度和美观性上存在不足，需一种更高效的方案。

Method: 方案分为三阶段：初始分割、迭代顶点插入与合并、顶点调整。

Result: 方案在Rosin度量和几何变换鲁棒性上表现良好。

Conclusion: 该方案高效且美观，适用于闭合数字曲线的近似。

Abstract: This paper proposes a fast and unsupervised scheme for a polygonal
approximation of a closed digital curve. It is demonstrated that the
approximation scheme is faster than state-of-the-art approximation and is
competitive with the same in Rosin's measure and in its aesthetic aspect. The
scheme comprises of three phases: initial segmentation, iterative vertex
insertion, and iterative merging, followed by vertex adjustment. The initial
segmentation is used to detect sharp turnings - the vertices that seemingly
have high curvature. It is likely that some of important vertices with low
curvature might have been missed out at the first phase and so iterative vertex
insertion is used to add vertices in a region where the curvature changes
slowly but steadily. The initial phase may pick up some undesirable vertices
and so merging is used to eliminate the redundant vertices. Finally, vertex
adjustment is used to facilitate enhancement in the aesthetic look of the
approximation. The quality of the approximations is measured using Rosin's
measure. The robustness of the proposed scheme with respect to geometric
transformation is observed.

</details>


### [985] [SSIMBaD: Sigma Scaling with SSIM-Guided Balanced Diffusion for AnimeFace Colorization](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04283)
*Junpyo Seo,Hanbin Koo,Jieun Yook,Byung-Ro Moon*

Main category: cs.GR

TL;DR: 提出了一种基于扩散模型的动漫风格面部草图自动上色框架，通过SSIMBaD技术优化感知一致性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>

Method: 采用连续时间扩散模型，引入SSIMBaD技术，通过sigma空间变换对齐结构相似性（SSIM）的感知退化。

Result: 在大规模动漫面部数据集上，该方法在像素精度和感知质量上均优于现有技术。

Conclusion: SSIMBaD框架在保持结构保真度的同时，实现了更平衡和忠实的上色效果。

Abstract: We propose a novel diffusion-based framework for automatic colorization of
Anime-style facial sketches. Our method preserves the structural fidelity of

schedules - which often compromise perceptual consistency -- our framework

perceptual quality, while generalizing to diverse styles. Code is available at
github.com/Giventicket/SSIMBaD-Sigma-Scaling-with-SSIM-Guided-Balanced-Diffusion-for-AnimeFace-Colorization

</details>


### [986] [Handle-based Mesh Deformation Guided By Vision Language Model](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04562)

Main category: cs.GR

### [987] [VoxDet: Rethinking 3D Semantic Occupancy Prediction as Dense Object Detection](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04623)
*Wuyang Li,Zhu Yu,Alexandre Alahi*

Main category: cs.GR

TL;DR: 论文提出了一种实例中心的3D语义占用预测方法VoxDet，通过将体素级分类任务解耦为偏移回归和语义预测，显著提升了实例级完整性和准确性。

### [988] [A Fast Unsupervised Scheme for Polygonal Approximation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04664)
*Bimal Kumar Ray*

Main category: cs.GR

TL;DR: 本文提出了一种快速且无监督的多边形近似闭合数字曲线的方案，其速度优于现有技术，并在Rosin度量及美学方面具有竞争力。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 旨在开发一种更高效且无需监督的方法来近似闭合数字曲线，同时保持较高的美学和度量质量。

Method: 方案分为三个阶段：初始分割、迭代顶点插入和迭代合并，最后进行顶点调整。初始分割检测高曲率顶点，迭代插入补充低曲率顶点，合并消除冗余顶点，调整优化美学效果。

Result: 方案在速度上优于现有技术，Rosin度量和美学表现均具竞争力，且对几何变换具有鲁棒性。

Conclusion: 该方案为闭合数字曲线的多边形近似提供了一种高效、无监督且美学优良的解决方案。

Abstract: This paper proposes a fast and unsupervised scheme for a polygonal
approximation of a closed digital curve. It is demonstrated that the
approximation scheme is faster than state-of-the-art approximation and is
competitive with the same in Rosin's measure and in its aesthetic aspect. The
scheme comprises of three phases: initial segmentation, iterative vertex
insertion, and iterative merging, followed by vertex adjustment. The initial
segmentation is used to detect sharp turnings - the vertices that seemingly
have high curvature. It is likely that some of important vertices with low
curvature might have been missed out at the first phase and so iterative vertex
insertion is used to add vertices in a region where the curvature changes
slowly but steadily. The initial phase may pick up some undesirable vertices
and so merging is used to eliminate the redundant vertices. Finally, vertex
adjustment is used to facilitate enhancement in the aesthetic look of the
approximation. The quality of the approximations is measured using Rosin's
measure. The robustness of the proposed scheme with respect to geometric
transformation is observed.

</details>

### [989] [Observations on robust diffusive stability and common Lyapunov functions](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04863)
*Blake McGrane-Corrigan,Rafael de Andrade Moral,Oliver Mason*

Main category: math.DS

TL;DR: 论文证明了对于一对Schur稳定的非负矩阵，存在共同对角Lyapunov函数是鲁棒扩散稳定性（RDS）的充分条件，并指出其与基于线性共正Lyapunov函数的结果不同。同时，论文还针对种群动力学中的扩展Leslie矩阵提出了两个RDS相关结果。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究非负矩阵对的鲁棒扩散稳定性（RDS），特别是探讨共同对角Lyapunov函数在RDS中的作用，并与现有基于线性共正Lyapunov函数的结果进行对比。

Method: 通过分析Schur稳定的非负矩阵对，证明共同对角Lyapunov函数的存在性是RDS的充分条件，并针对扩展Leslie矩阵提出相关结果。

Result: 共同对角Lyapunov函数的存在确保了RDS，且这一条件与线性共正Lyapunov函数的结果不同。此外，论文还针对扩展Leslie矩阵给出了两个RDS相关结论。

Conclusion: 共同对角Lyapunov函数是RDS的有效工具，其适用性与现有方法不同，且在种群动力学中的应用展示了其潜力。

Abstract: We consider the problem of robust diffusive stability (RDS) for a pair of
Schur-stable nonnegative matrices. Specifically, we show that the existence of
a common diagonal Lyapunov function is sufficient for RDS and highlight how
this condition differs from recently published results based on linear
copositive Lyapunov functions. We also present two results on RDS for extended
Leslie matrices arising in population dynamics.

</details>


### [990] [Observations on robust diffusive stability and common Lyapunov functions](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04863)
*Blake McGrane-Corrigan,Rafael de Andrade Moral,Oliver Mason*

Main category: math.DS

TL;DR: 论文研究了Schur稳定非负矩阵对的鲁棒扩散稳定性（RDS），提出共同对角Lyapunov函数的存在是RDS的充分条件，并比较了与线性共正Lyapunov函数结果的差异。此外，还针对种群动力学中的扩展Leslie矩阵提出了两个RDS结果。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 探讨Schur稳定非负矩阵对的鲁棒扩散稳定性，明确共同对角Lyapunov函数的作用，并与现有方法进行比较。

Method: 通过分析共同对角Lyapunov函数的存在性，证明其对RDS的充分性，并比较与线性共正Lyapunov函数的差异。针对扩展Leslie矩阵，提出两个RDS结果。

Result: 共同对角Lyapunov函数的存在是RDS的充分条件，且与线性共正Lyapunov函数的结果不同。扩展Leslie矩阵的RDS结果也得到了验证。

Conclusion: 共同对角Lyapunov函数为RDS提供了新的充分条件，扩展了现有理论，并在种群动力学中有潜在应用。

Abstract: We consider the problem of robust diffusive stability (RDS) for a pair of
Schur-stable nonnegative matrices. Specifically, we show that the existence of
a common diagonal Lyapunov function is sufficient for RDS and highlight how
this condition differs from recently published results based on linear
copositive Lyapunov functions. We also present two results on RDS for extended
Leslie matrices arising in population dynamics.

</details>

### [991] [Estimating properties of a homogeneous bounded soil using machine learning models](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04256)
*Konstantinos Kalimeris,Leonidas Mindrinos,Nikolaos Pallikarakis*

Main category: physics.geo-ph

TL;DR: 利用机器学习模型从水分测量数据估计土壤性质，支持向量机和神经网络表现最佳。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 解决从水分测量数据中准确估计土壤性质的问题，尤其是扩散率D和导水率K。

Method: 使用Fokas方法模拟数据，并比较多种机器学习模型在完整、噪声和有限数据条件下的表现。

Result: 扩散率D的预测比导水率K更准确，支持向量机和神经网络在鲁棒性和准确性上表现最优。

Conclusion: 支持向量机和神经网络是解决此类参数识别问题的有效工具。

Abstract: This work focuses on estimating soil properties from water moisture
measurements. We consider simulated data generated by solving the
initial-boundary value problem governing vertical infiltration in a
homogeneous, bounded soil profile, with the usage of the Fokas method. To
address the parameter identification problem, which is formulated as a
two-output regression task, we explore various machine learning models. The
performance of each model is assessed under different data conditions: full,
noisy, and limited. Overall, the prediction of diffusivity $D$ tends to be more
accurate than that of hydraulic conductivity $K.$ Among the models considered,
Support Vector Machines (SVMs) and Neural Networks (NNs) demonstrate the
highest robustness, achieving near-perfect accuracy and minimal errors.

</details>


### [992] [Estimating properties of a homogeneous bounded soil using machine learning models](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04256)
*Konstantinos Kalimeris,Leonidas Mindrinos,Nikolaos Pallikarakis*

Main category: physics.geo-ph

TL;DR: 论文研究了从水分测量数据估算土壤性质的方法，通过模拟数据和机器学习模型评估了不同条件下的预测性能。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 解决从水分测量数据中准确估算土壤特性的参数识别问题。

Method: 使用Fokas方法模拟垂直渗透数据，并比较多种机器学习模型（如SVM和NN）在不同数据条件下的表现。

Result: 扩散系数D的预测比水力传导系数K更准确，SVM和NN模型表现最优，具有高鲁棒性和低误差。

Conclusion: SVM和NN模型在土壤参数预测中表现最佳，尤其适用于复杂数据条件。

Abstract: This work focuses on estimating soil properties from water moisture
measurements. We consider simulated data generated by solving the
initial-boundary value problem governing vertical infiltration in a
homogeneous, bounded soil profile, with the usage of the Fokas method. To
address the parameter identification problem, which is formulated as a
two-output regression task, we explore various machine learning models. The
performance of each model is assessed under different data conditions: full,
noisy, and limited. Overall, the prediction of diffusivity $D$ tends to be more
accurate than that of hydraulic conductivity $K.$ Among the models considered,
Support Vector Machines (SVMs) and Neural Networks (NNs) demonstrate the
highest robustness, achieving near-perfect accuracy and minimal errors.

</details>

### [993] [Energy-Optimized Scheduling for AIoT Workloads Using TOPSIS](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04902)
*Preethika Pradeep,Eyhab Al-Masri*

Main category: cs.DC

TL;DR: GreenPod是一个基于TOPSIS的调度器，优化了Kubernetes集群中的Pod放置，显著提升了能源效率。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: AIoT工作负载需要跨云边基础设施的高效能源调度，而Kubernetes默认调度器缺乏对异构环境的多标准优化。

Method: GreenPod采用TOPSIS方法，综合考虑执行时间、能耗、处理核心、内存可用性和资源平衡来优化Pod放置。

Result: 在异构Google Kubernetes集群测试中，GreenPod比默认调度器提升能源效率高达39.1%，尤其在能源权重方案下表现突出。

Conclusion: GreenPod在AIoT应用中有效平衡了可持续性和性能，中等复杂度工作负载的节能效果最佳。

Abstract: AIoT workloads demand energy-efficient orchestration across cloud-edge
infrastructures, but Kubernetes' default scheduler lacks multi-criteria
optimization for heterogeneous environments. This paper presents GreenPod, a
TOPSIS-based scheduler optimizing pod placement based on execution time, energy
consumption, processing core, memory availability, and resource balance. Tested
on a heterogeneous Google Kubernetes cluster, GreenPod improves energy
efficiency by up to 39.1% over the default Kubernetes (K8s) scheduler,
particularly with energy-centric weighting schemes. Medium complexity workloads
showed the highest energy savings, despite slight scheduling latency. GreenPod
effectively balances sustainability and performance for AIoT applications.

</details>


### [994] [FlashDMoE: Fast Distributed MoE in a Single Kernel](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04667)
*Osayamen Jonathan Aimuyo,Byungsoo Oh,Rachee Singh*

Main category: cs.DC

TL;DR: FlashDMoE通过GPU内核融合和设备启动通信协议，显著提升了MoE模型的性能，降低了延迟并提高了GPU利用率。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有MoE模型实现存在GPU利用率低、延迟高和无法利用任务局部性的问题，限制了大规模神经网络的训练效率。

Method: 开发了FlashDMoE，一种完全GPU驻留的MoE算子，将专家计算和GPU间通信融合为单个持久GPU内核，实现细粒度流水线。

Result: 在8-H100 GPU节点上，FlashDMoE实现了6倍延迟降低、5.7倍吞吐量提升、4倍弱扩展效率提升和9倍GPU利用率提升。

Conclusion: FlashDMoE证明了GPU内核与硬件协同设计是解锁大规模分布式机器学习性能上限的关键。

Abstract: The computational sparsity of Mixture-of-Experts (MoE) models enables
sub-linear growth in compute cost as model size increases, offering a scalable
path to training massive neural networks. However, existing implementations
suffer from \emph{low GPU utilization}, \emph{significant latency overhead},
and a fundamental \emph{inability to leverage task locality}, primarily due to
CPU-managed scheduling, host-initiated communication, and frequent kernel
launches. To overcome these limitations, we develop FlashDMoE, a fully
GPU-resident MoE operator that fuses expert computation and inter-GPU
communication into a \emph{single persistent GPU kernel}. FlashDMoE enables
fine-grained pipelining of dispatch, compute, and combine phases, eliminating
launch overheads and reducing idle gaps. Its device-initiated communication
protocol introduces \emph{payload-efficient} data transfers, significantly
shrinking buffer sizes in sparsely activated MoE layers. When evaluated on a
single 8-H100 GPU node with MoE models having up to 128 experts and 16K token
sequences, FlashDMoE achieves up to \textbf{6}x lower latency, \textbf{5,7}x
higher throughput, \textbf{4}x better weak scaling efficiency, and \textbf{9}x
higher GPU utilization compared to state-of-the-art baselines, despite using
FP32 while baselines use FP16. FlashDMoE demonstrates that principled GPU
kernel-hardware co-design is key to unlocking the performance ceiling of
large-scale distributed ML workloads.

</details>


### [995] [Energy-Optimized Scheduling for AIoT Workloads Using TOPSIS](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04902)
*Preethika Pradeep,Eyhab Al-Masri*

Main category: cs.DC

TL;DR: GreenPod是一个基于TOPSIS的调度器，用于优化AIoT工作负载在云边异构环境中的能源效率和性能。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: Kubernetes默认调度器缺乏对异构环境的多标准优化，无法满足AIoT工作负载对能源高效调度的需求。

Method: GreenPod采用TOPSIS方法，优化Pod的放置，考虑执行时间、能耗、处理核心、内存可用性和资源平衡。

Result: 在异构Google Kubernetes集群上测试，GreenPod比默认K8s调度器节能高达39.1%，尤其在能源中心权重方案下表现最佳。

Conclusion: GreenPod在AIoT应用中有效平衡了可持续性和性能，中等复杂度工作负载节能效果最显著。

Abstract: AIoT workloads demand energy-efficient orchestration across cloud-edge
infrastructures, but Kubernetes' default scheduler lacks multi-criteria
optimization for heterogeneous environments. This paper presents GreenPod, a
TOPSIS-based scheduler optimizing pod placement based on execution time, energy
consumption, processing core, memory availability, and resource balance. Tested
on a heterogeneous Google Kubernetes cluster, GreenPod improves energy
efficiency by up to 39.1% over the default Kubernetes (K8s) scheduler,
particularly with energy-centric weighting schemes. Medium complexity workloads
showed the highest energy savings, despite slight scheduling latency. GreenPod
effectively balances sustainability and performance for AIoT applications.

</details>


### [996] [FlashDMoE: Fast Distributed MoE in a Single Kernel](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04667)
*Osayamen Jonathan Aimuyo,Byungsoo Oh,Rachee Singh*

Main category: cs.DC

TL;DR: FlashDMoE是一个完全GPU驻留的MoE算子，通过融合专家计算和GPU间通信到单一持久GPU内核，显著提升了性能。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有MoE模型实现存在GPU利用率低、延迟高和无法利用任务局部性的问题，主要原因是CPU管理的调度和频繁内核启动。

Method: 开发了FlashDMoE，采用设备启动的通信协议和细粒度流水线技术，减少启动开销和空闲时间。

Result: 在8-H100 GPU节点上，FlashDMoE实现了6倍延迟降低、5.7倍吞吐提升、4倍弱扩展效率提升和9倍GPU利用率提升。

Conclusion: FlashDMoE证明了GPU内核与硬件协同设计对提升大规模分布式ML工作负载性能的关键作用。

Abstract: The computational sparsity of Mixture-of-Experts (MoE) models enables
sub-linear growth in compute cost as model size increases, offering a scalable
path to training massive neural networks. However, existing implementations
suffer from \emph{low GPU utilization}, \emph{significant latency overhead},
and a fundamental \emph{inability to leverage task locality}, primarily due to
CPU-managed scheduling, host-initiated communication, and frequent kernel
launches. To overcome these limitations, we develop FlashDMoE, a fully
GPU-resident MoE operator that fuses expert computation and inter-GPU
communication into a \emph{single persistent GPU kernel}. FlashDMoE enables
fine-grained pipelining of dispatch, compute, and combine phases, eliminating
launch overheads and reducing idle gaps. Its device-initiated communication
protocol introduces \emph{payload-efficient} data transfers, significantly
shrinking buffer sizes in sparsely activated MoE layers. When evaluated on a
single 8-H100 GPU node with MoE models having up to 128 experts and 16K token
sequences, FlashDMoE achieves up to \textbf{6}x lower latency, \textbf{5,7}x
higher throughput, \textbf{4}x better weak scaling efficiency, and \textbf{9}x
higher GPU utilization compared to state-of-the-art baselines, despite using
FP32 while baselines use FP16. FlashDMoE demonstrates that principled GPU
kernel-hardware co-design is key to unlocking the performance ceiling of
large-scale distributed ML workloads.

</details>

### [997] [ChemReservoir -- An Open-Source Framework for Chemically-Inspired Reservoir Computing](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04249)
*Mehmet Aziz Yirik,Jakob Lykke Andersen,Rolf Fagerberg,Daniel Merkle*

Main category: cs.CE

TL;DR: ChemReservoir是一个开源框架，用于化学启发的储层计算，解决了先前DNA化学工具的限制。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 先前基于DNA化学的储层计算工具维护不足且通用性有限，需要开源且通用的解决方案。

Method: 开发了ChemReservoir框架，支持构建和分析化学启发的储层，并增强测试、评估和可重复性。

Result: 工具在多种储层拓扑结构中表现稳定，适用于记忆容量任务。

Conclusion: ChemReservoir为化学启发的储层计算提供了通用且可靠的解决方案。

Abstract: Reservoir computing is a type of a recurrent neural network, mapping the
inputs into higher dimensional space using fixed and nonlinear dynamical
systems, called reservoirs. In the literature, there are various types of
reservoirs ranging from in-silico to in-vitro. In cheminformatics, previous
studies contributed to the field by developing simulation-based chemically
inspired in-silico reservoir models. Yahiro used a DNA-based chemical reaction
network as its reservoir and Nguyen developed a DNA chemistry-inspired tool
based on Gillespie algorithm. However, these software tools were designed
mainly with the focus on DNA chemistry and their maintenance status has limited
their current usability. Due to these limitations, there was a need for a
proper open-source tool. This study introduces ChemReservoir, an open-source
framework for chemically-inspired reservoir computing. In contrast to the
former studies focused on DNA-chemistry, ChemReservoir is a general framework
for the construction and analysis of chemically-inspired reservoirs, which also
addresses the limitations in these previous studies by ensuring enhanced
testing, evaluation, and reproducibility. The tool was evaluated using various
cycle-based reservoir topologies and demonstrated stable performance across a
range of configurations in memory capacity tasks.

</details>


### [998] [ChemReservoir -- An Open-Source Framework for Chemically-Inspired Reservoir Computing](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04249)
*Mehmet Aziz Yirik,Jakob Lykke Andersen,Rolf Fagerberg,Daniel Merkle*

Main category: cs.CE

TL;DR: 本文介绍了ChemReservoir，一个开源的化学启发式储备计算框架，解决了以往工具在DNA化学领域的局限性，提供了更通用的设计和分析功能。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 以往基于DNA化学的储备计算工具维护不足且功能有限，需要一种开源且通用的化学启发式储备计算框架。

Method: 开发了ChemReservoir框架，支持构建和分析化学启发式储备，并进行测试、评估和复现。

Result: 工具在多种循环储备拓扑中表现稳定，适用于记忆容量任务。

Conclusion: ChemReservoir是一个通用且稳定的开源工具，弥补了以往研究的不足。

Abstract: Reservoir computing is a type of a recurrent neural network, mapping the
inputs into higher dimensional space using fixed and nonlinear dynamical
systems, called reservoirs. In the literature, there are various types of
reservoirs ranging from in-silico to in-vitro. In cheminformatics, previous
studies contributed to the field by developing simulation-based chemically
inspired in-silico reservoir models. Yahiro used a DNA-based chemical reaction
network as its reservoir and Nguyen developed a DNA chemistry-inspired tool
based on Gillespie algorithm. However, these software tools were designed
mainly with the focus on DNA chemistry and their maintenance status has limited
their current usability. Due to these limitations, there was a need for a
proper open-source tool. This study introduces ChemReservoir, an open-source
framework for chemically-inspired reservoir computing. In contrast to the
former studies focused on DNA-chemistry, ChemReservoir is a general framework
for the construction and analysis of chemically-inspired reservoirs, which also
addresses the limitations in these previous studies by ensuring enhanced
testing, evaluation, and reproducibility. The tool was evaluated using various
cycle-based reservoir topologies and demonstrated stable performance across a
range of configurations in memory capacity tasks.

</details>

### [999] [On the Wasserstein Geodesic Principal Component Analysis of probability measures](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04480)
*Nina Vesseron,Elsa Cazelles,Alice Le Brigant,Thierry Klein*

Main category: stat.ML

TL;DR: 论文提出了一种基于Otto-Wasserstein几何的概率分布集合的测地主成分分析方法（GPCA），旨在识别最佳捕捉数据集变化模式的地测曲线。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究目的是在概率测度空间中识别能够有效描述数据集变化模式的地测曲线。

Method: 首先针对高斯分布集合，展示了如何在可逆线性映射空间中计算；对于更一般的绝对连续概率测度，利用神经网络参数化Wasserstein空间中的地测曲线。

Result: 通过多种示例与经典切空间PCA进行比较，并在真实数据集上进行了验证。

Conclusion: 该方法在概率测度空间中有效捕捉了数据集的变化模式，并通过实验验证了其优越性。

Abstract: This paper focuses on Geodesic Principal Component Analysis (GPCA) on a
collection of probability distributions using the Otto-Wasserstein geometry.
The goal is to identify geodesic curves in the space of probability measures
that best capture the modes of variation of the underlying dataset. We first
address the case of a collection of Gaussian distributions, and show how to
lift the computations in the space of invertible linear maps. For the more
general setting of absolutely continuous probability measures, we leverage a
novel approach to parameterizing geodesics in Wasserstein space with neural
networks. Finally, we compare to classical tangent PCA through various examples
and provide illustrations on real-world datasets.

</details>


### [1000] [Regret-Optimal Q-Learning with Low Cost for Single-Agent and Federated Reinforcement Learning](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04626)
*Haochen Zhang,Zhong Zheng,Lingzhou Xue*

Main category: stat.ML

TL;DR: 论文提出两种新型无模型强化学习算法，旨在降低样本和通信成本，同时保持最优遗憾性能。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 解决现实场景中数据收集和策略部署成本高的问题，特别是在单智能体和联邦强化学习中。

Method: 提出Q-EarlySettled-LowCost和FedQ-EarlySettled-LowCost算法，实现低样本成本和通信成本。

Result: 算法在样本成本、通信成本和遗憾性能上均优于现有方法。

Conclusion: 新算法在降低成本和保持性能方面具有显著优势，适用于实际应用。

Abstract: Motivated by real-world settings where data collection and policy deployment
-- whether for a single agent or across multiple agents -- are costly, we study
the problem of on-policy single-agent reinforcement learning (RL) and federated
RL (FRL) with a focus on minimizing burn-in costs (the sample sizes needed to
reach near-optimal regret) and policy switching or communication costs. In
parallel finite-horizon episodic Markov Decision Processes (MDPs) with $S$
states and $A$ actions, existing methods either require superlinear burn-in
costs in $S$ and $A$ or fail to achieve logarithmic switching or communication
costs. We propose two novel model-free RL algorithms -- Q-EarlySettled-LowCost
and FedQ-EarlySettled-LowCost -- that are the first in the literature to
simultaneously achieve: (i) the best near-optimal regret among all known
model-free RL or FRL algorithms, (ii) low burn-in cost that scales linearly
with $S$ and $A$, and (iii) logarithmic policy switching cost for single-agent
RL or communication cost for FRL. Additionally, we establish gap-dependent
theoretical guarantees for both regret and switching/communication costs,
improving or matching the best-known gap-dependent bounds.

</details>


### [1001] [Distributional encoding for Gaussian process regression with qualitative inputs](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04813)
*Sébastien Da Veiga*

Main category: stat.ML

TL;DR: 论文提出了一种基于分布编码（DE）的改进高斯过程（GP）回归方法，用于处理分类变量，提升了预测性能和计算效率。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 高斯过程回归在处理分类变量时面临预测和计算效率的挑战，传统目标编码方法仅使用目标变量的均值，信息利用不足。

Method: 提出分布编码（DE）方法，利用目标变量的全部分布信息，结合特征核（如最大均值差异和Wasserstein距离）改进GP。

Result: 实验验证表明，DE方法在合成和真实数据集上实现了最先进的预测性能。

Conclusion: DE方法为处理分类变量的GP回归提供了高效解决方案，并与离散和混合空间贝叶斯优化（BO）的最新进展互补。

Abstract: Gaussian Process (GP) regression is a popular and sample-efficient approach
for many engineering applications, where observations are expensive to acquire,
and is also a central ingredient of Bayesian optimization (BO), a highly
prevailing method for the optimization of black-box functions. However, when
all or some input variables are categorical, building a predictive and
computationally efficient GP remains challenging. Starting from the naive
target encoding idea, where the original categorical values are replaced with
the mean of the target variable for that category, we propose a generalization
based on distributional encoding (DE) which makes use of all samples of the
target variable for a category. To handle this type of encoding inside the GP,
we build upon recent results on characteristic kernels for probability
distributions, based on the maximum mean discrepancy and the Wasserstein
distance. We also discuss several extensions for classification, multi-task
learning and incorporation or auxiliary information. Our approach is validated
empirically, and we demonstrate state-of-the-art predictive performance on a
variety of synthetic and real-world datasets. DE is naturally complementary to
recent advances in BO over discrete and mixed-spaces.

</details>


### [1002] [Learning Joint Interventional Effects from Single-Variable Interventions in Additive Models](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04945)
*Armin Kekić,Sergio Hernan Garrido Mejia,Bernhard Schölkopf*

Main category: stat.ML

TL;DR: 研究提出了一种仅使用观察数据和单变量干预数据来估计联合干预效果的方法，通过非线性加性机制实现联合效应的可识别性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在多个领域中，联合干预的效果估计很重要，但获取联合干预数据困难，因此需要一种替代方法。

Method: 提出了一种可识别性结果，将因果效应分解为每个干预变量的混杂和非混杂贡献，并设计了实用估计器。

Result: 在合成数据上的实验表明，该方法性能接近直接使用联合干预数据训练的模型，优于纯观察估计器。

Conclusion: 仅使用观察和单变量干预数据即可有效估计联合干预效果，为实际应用提供了可行方案。

Abstract: Estimating causal effects of joint interventions on multiple variables is
crucial in many domains, but obtaining data from such simultaneous
interventions can be challenging. Our study explores how to learn joint
interventional effects using only observational data and single-variable
interventions. We present an identifiability result for this problem, showing
that for a class of nonlinear additive outcome mechanisms, joint effects can be
inferred without access to joint interventional data. We propose a practical
estimator that decomposes the causal effect into confounded and unconfounded
contributions for each intervention variable. Experiments on synthetic data
demonstrate that our method achieves performance comparable to models trained
directly on joint interventional data, outperforming a purely observational
estimator.

</details>


### [1003] [Nonlinear Causal Discovery for Grouped Data](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.05120)
*Konstantin Göbler,Tobias Windisch,Mathias Drton*

Main category: stat.ML

TL;DR: 本文提出了一种扩展非线性加性噪声模型的方法，用于处理随机向量，以推断变量组之间的因果关系。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在神经科学、心理学、社会科学和工业制造等领域，因果关系的单位通常是变量组而非单个标量变量，现有方法对此支持不足。

Method: 采用两步法：首先推断随机向量间的因果顺序，然后进行模型选择以确定最佳因果图。

Result: 在模拟实验中表现优异，并成功应用于真实世界的装配线数据。

Conclusion: 该方法为变量组间的因果推断提供了有效解决方案。

Abstract: Inferring cause-effect relationships from observational data has gained
significant attention in recent years, but most methods are limited to scalar
random variables. In many important domains, including neuroscience,
psychology, social science, and industrial manufacturing, the causal units of
interest are groups of variables rather than individual scalar measurements.
Motivated by these applications, we extend nonlinear additive noise models to
handle random vectors, establishing a two-step approach for causal graph
learning: First, infer the causal order among random vectors. Second, perform
model selection to identify the best graph consistent with this order. We
introduce effective and novel solutions for both steps in the vector case,
demonstrating strong performance in simulations. Finally, we apply our method
to real-world assembly line data with partial knowledge of causal ordering
among variable groups.

</details>


### [1004] [Causal Effect Identification in lvLiNGAM from Higher-Order Cumulants](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.05202)
*Daniele Tramontano,Yaroslav Kivva,Saber Salehkaleybar Mathias Drton,Negar Kiyavash*

Main category: stat.ML

TL;DR: 论文研究了在潜在变量线性非高斯无环模型（lvLiNGAM）中利用高阶累积量识别因果效应，解决了存在潜在混杂时的两种挑战性场景：单代理变量和欠定工具变量情况。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 解决潜在混杂下因果效应识别的挑战，特别是在单代理变量和工具变量不足的情况下。

Method: 利用高阶累积量证明因果效应的可识别性，并提供相应的估计方法。

Result: 实验结果表明，相比现有方法，所提方法具有更高的准确性和鲁棒性。

Conclusion: 研究推进了线性系统中潜在混杂下因果推断的理论和实践理解。

Abstract: This paper investigates causal effect identification in latent variable
Linear Non-Gaussian Acyclic Models (lvLiNGAM) using higher-order cumulants,
addressing two prominent setups that are challenging in the presence of latent
confounding: (1) a single proxy variable that may causally influence the
treatment and (2) underspecified instrumental variable cases where fewer
instruments exist than treatments. We prove that causal effects are
identifiable with a single proxy or instrument and provide corresponding
estimation methods. Experimental results demonstrate the accuracy and
robustness of our approaches compared to existing methods, advancing the
theoretical and practical understanding of causal inference in linear systems
with latent confounders.

</details>


### [1005] [Admissibility of Completely Randomized Trials: A Large-Deviation Approach](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.05329)
*Guido Imbens,Chao Qin,Stefan Wager*

Main category: stat.ML

TL;DR: 在最佳臂识别问题中，忽略自适应试验选项而选择非自适应试验是不可取的。研究发现，当至少有三个处理臂时，简单的自适应设计在统计效率上普遍且严格优于完全随机试验。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 探讨在最佳臂识别问题中，自适应试验是否比非自适应试验更具优势。

Method: 研究采用批处理臂淘汰设计，逐步淘汰表现不佳的处理臂，并分析其统计效率。

Result: 当至少有三个处理臂时，自适应设计在效率指数上严格优于完全随机试验。

Conclusion: 自适应设计在最佳臂识别问题中具有显著优势，解决了Qin[2022]中的第二个开放问题。

Abstract: When an experimenter has the option of running an adaptive trial, is it
admissible to ignore this option and run a non-adaptive trial instead? We
provide a negative answer to this question in the best-arm identification
problem, where the experimenter aims to allocate measurement efforts
judiciously to confidently deploy the most effective treatment arm. We find
that, whenever there are at least three treatment arms, there exist simple
adaptive designs that universally and strictly dominate non-adaptive completely
randomized trials. This dominance is characterized by a notion called
efficiency exponent, which quantifies a design's statistical efficiency when
the experimental sample is large. Our analysis focuses on the class of batched
arm elimination designs, which progressively eliminate underperforming arms at
pre-specified batch intervals. We characterize simple sufficient conditions
under which these designs universally and strictly dominate completely
randomized trials. These results resolve the second open problem posed in Qin
[2022].

</details>


### [1006] [On the Wasserstein Geodesic Principal Component Analysis of probability measures](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04480)
*Nina Vesseron,Elsa Cazelles,Alice Le Brigant,Thierry Klein*

Main category: stat.ML

TL;DR: 论文研究了在Otto-Wasserstein几何下对概率分布集合进行测地主成分分析（GPCA），旨在识别最佳捕捉数据变化模式的地测曲线。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 通过GPCA在概率测度空间中识别地测曲线，以更好地理解数据的变化模式。

Method: 针对高斯分布集合，将计算提升到可逆线性映射空间；对于绝对连续概率测度，采用神经网络参数化Wasserstein空间中的地测曲线。

Result: 通过实例与经典切空间PCA对比，验证了方法的有效性。

Conclusion: 提出的方法在真实数据集上展示了其适用性和优势。

Abstract: This paper focuses on Geodesic Principal Component Analysis (GPCA) on a
collection of probability distributions using the Otto-Wasserstein geometry.
The goal is to identify geodesic curves in the space of probability measures
that best capture the modes of variation of the underlying dataset. We first
address the case of a collection of Gaussian distributions, and show how to
lift the computations in the space of invertible linear maps. For the more
general setting of absolutely continuous probability measures, we leverage a
novel approach to parameterizing geodesics in Wasserstein space with neural
networks. Finally, we compare to classical tangent PCA through various examples
and provide illustrations on real-world datasets.

</details>


### [1007] [Regret-Optimal Q-Learning with Low Cost for Single-Agent and Federated Reinforcement Learning](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04626)
*Haochen Zhang,Zhong Zheng,Lingzhou Xue*

Main category: stat.ML

TL;DR: 论文提出两种新型无模型强化学习算法，旨在降低样本成本和通信成本，同时保持最优遗憾性能。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究现实场景中数据收集和策略部署的高成本问题，专注于最小化单智能体和联邦强化学习的启动成本及策略切换或通信成本。

Method: 提出Q-EarlySettled-LowCost和FedQ-EarlySettled-LowCost算法，结合线性启动成本和对数策略切换/通信成本。

Result: 算法在保持最优遗憾的同时，实现了线性启动成本和对数策略切换/通信成本，并改进了理论边界。

Conclusion: 新算法在降低成本和提升性能方面具有显著优势，适用于高成本场景。

Abstract: Motivated by real-world settings where data collection and policy deployment
-- whether for a single agent or across multiple agents -- are costly, we study
the problem of on-policy single-agent reinforcement learning (RL) and federated
RL (FRL) with a focus on minimizing burn-in costs (the sample sizes needed to
reach near-optimal regret) and policy switching or communication costs. In
parallel finite-horizon episodic Markov Decision Processes (MDPs) with $S$
states and $A$ actions, existing methods either require superlinear burn-in
costs in $S$ and $A$ or fail to achieve logarithmic switching or communication
costs. We propose two novel model-free RL algorithms -- Q-EarlySettled-LowCost
and FedQ-EarlySettled-LowCost -- that are the first in the literature to
simultaneously achieve: (i) the best near-optimal regret among all known
model-free RL or FRL algorithms, (ii) low burn-in cost that scales linearly
with $S$ and $A$, and (iii) logarithmic policy switching cost for single-agent
RL or communication cost for FRL. Additionally, we establish gap-dependent
theoretical guarantees for both regret and switching/communication costs,
improving or matching the best-known gap-dependent bounds.

</details>


### [1008] [Distributional encoding for Gaussian process regression with qualitative inputs](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04813)
*Sébastien Da Veiga*

Main category: stat.ML

TL;DR: 论文提出了一种基于分布编码（DE）的改进高斯过程（GP）回归方法，用于处理分类变量，并在贝叶斯优化（BO）中展示了优越性能。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在工程应用中，观测成本高，而传统GP在处理分类变量时预测和计算效率不足。

Method: 从目标编码出发，提出分布编码（DE），利用目标变量的全部分布信息，结合特征核（如最大均值差异和Wasserstein距离）改进GP。

Result: 实验验证了DE在合成和真实数据集上的优越预测性能，并与离散和混合空间BO的最新进展互补。

Conclusion: DE为处理分类变量的GP提供了一种高效且预测性能优越的解决方案，适用于多种扩展场景。

Abstract: Gaussian Process (GP) regression is a popular and sample-efficient approach
for many engineering applications, where observations are expensive to acquire,
and is also a central ingredient of Bayesian optimization (BO), a highly
prevailing method for the optimization of black-box functions. However, when
all or some input variables are categorical, building a predictive and
computationally efficient GP remains challenging. Starting from the naive
target encoding idea, where the original categorical values are replaced with
the mean of the target variable for that category, we propose a generalization
based on distributional encoding (DE) which makes use of all samples of the
target variable for a category. To handle this type of encoding inside the GP,
we build upon recent results on characteristic kernels for probability
distributions, based on the maximum mean discrepancy and the Wasserstein
distance. We also discuss several extensions for classification, multi-task
learning and incorporation or auxiliary information. Our approach is validated
empirically, and we demonstrate state-of-the-art predictive performance on a
variety of synthetic and real-world datasets. DE is naturally complementary to
recent advances in BO over discrete and mixed-spaces.

</details>


### [1009] [Learning Joint Interventional Effects from Single-Variable Interventions in Additive Models](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04945)
*Armin Kekić,Sergio Hernan Garrido Mejia,Bernhard Schölkopf*

Main category: stat.ML

TL;DR: 研究提出了一种仅使用观测数据和单变量干预数据来估计联合干预因果效应的方法，证明了在非线性加性机制下联合效应是可识别的，并通过实验验证了其有效性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在许多领域中，联合干预的因果效应估计很重要，但获取联合干预数据困难。

Method: 提出了一种可识别性结果，将因果效应分解为每个干预变量的混杂和非混杂贡献，并设计了实用估计器。

Result: 实验表明，该方法在合成数据上的表现与直接使用联合干预数据训练的模型相当，优于纯观测估计器。

Conclusion: 研究证明了仅用观测和单变量干预数据即可有效估计联合干预效应，为实际应用提供了新思路。

Abstract: Estimating causal effects of joint interventions on multiple variables is
crucial in many domains, but obtaining data from such simultaneous
interventions can be challenging. Our study explores how to learn joint
interventional effects using only observational data and single-variable
interventions. We present an identifiability result for this problem, showing
that for a class of nonlinear additive outcome mechanisms, joint effects can be
inferred without access to joint interventional data. We propose a practical
estimator that decomposes the causal effect into confounded and unconfounded
contributions for each intervention variable. Experiments on synthetic data
demonstrate that our method achieves performance comparable to models trained
directly on joint interventional data, outperforming a purely observational
estimator.

</details>


### [1010] [Nonlinear Causal Discovery for Grouped Data](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.05120)
*Konstantin Göbler,Tobias Windisch,Mathias Drton*

Main category: stat.ML

TL;DR: 论文提出了一种扩展非线性加性噪声模型的方法，用于处理随机向量，以推断变量组之间的因果关系。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 许多领域（如神经科学、心理学、社会科学和工业制造）中，因果关系的单位是变量组而非单一标量变量，现有方法对此支持不足。

Method: 采用两步法：先推断随机向量间的因果顺序，再进行模型选择以确定最佳因果图。

Result: 在模拟实验中表现出色，并成功应用于实际工业装配线数据。

Conclusion: 该方法为变量组间的因果推断提供了有效解决方案，具有实际应用潜力。

Abstract: Inferring cause-effect relationships from observational data has gained
significant attention in recent years, but most methods are limited to scalar
random variables. In many important domains, including neuroscience,
psychology, social science, and industrial manufacturing, the causal units of
interest are groups of variables rather than individual scalar measurements.
Motivated by these applications, we extend nonlinear additive noise models to
handle random vectors, establishing a two-step approach for causal graph
learning: First, infer the causal order among random vectors. Second, perform
model selection to identify the best graph consistent with this order. We
introduce effective and novel solutions for both steps in the vector case,
demonstrating strong performance in simulations. Finally, we apply our method
to real-world assembly line data with partial knowledge of causal ordering
among variable groups.

</details>


### [1011] [Causal Effect Identification in lvLiNGAM from Higher-Order Cumulants](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.05202)
*Daniele Tramontano,Yaroslav Kivva,Saber Salehkaleybar Mathias Drton,Negar Kiyavash*

Main category: stat.ML

TL;DR: 本文研究了在潜在变量线性非高斯无环模型（lvLiNGAM）中使用高阶累积量进行因果效应识别，解决了存在潜在混杂时的两个挑战性场景：单代理变量和欠指定工具变量。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 解决在潜在混杂存在下因果效应识别的挑战，特别是单代理变量和工具变量不足的情况。

Method: 利用高阶累积量证明因果效应在单代理或工具变量下可识别，并提供相应估计方法。

Result: 实验结果表明，所提方法在准确性和鲁棒性上优于现有方法。

Conclusion: 本文在理论和实践上推进了线性系统中潜在混杂下的因果推断研究。

Abstract: This paper investigates causal effect identification in latent variable
Linear Non-Gaussian Acyclic Models (lvLiNGAM) using higher-order cumulants,
addressing two prominent setups that are challenging in the presence of latent
confounding: (1) a single proxy variable that may causally influence the
treatment and (2) underspecified instrumental variable cases where fewer
instruments exist than treatments. We prove that causal effects are
identifiable with a single proxy or instrument and provide corresponding
estimation methods. Experimental results demonstrate the accuracy and
robustness of our approaches compared to existing methods, advancing the
theoretical and practical understanding of causal inference in linear systems
with latent confounders.

</details>


### [1012] [Admissibility of Completely Randomized Trials: A Large-Deviation Approach](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.05329)
*Guido Imbens,Chao Qin,Stefan Wager*

Main category: stat.ML

TL;DR: 在最佳臂识别问题中，当实验者可以选择自适应试验时，忽略此选项而选择非自适应试验是不可取的。研究发现，对于至少三个处理臂的情况，存在简单的自适应设计，其统计效率严格优于完全随机试验。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 探讨在最佳臂识别问题中，自适应试验是否比非自适应试验更具优势，以优化实验资源分配。

Method: 研究采用批量臂淘汰设计，逐步淘汰表现不佳的处理臂，并通过效率指数量化统计效率。

Result: 当处理臂数量至少为三个时，某些自适应设计在统计效率上严格优于完全随机试验。

Conclusion: 自适应设计在最佳臂识别问题中具有显著优势，解决了Qin [2022]提出的第二个开放问题。

Abstract: When an experimenter has the option of running an adaptive trial, is it
admissible to ignore this option and run a non-adaptive trial instead? We
provide a negative answer to this question in the best-arm identification
problem, where the experimenter aims to allocate measurement efforts
judiciously to confidently deploy the most effective treatment arm. We find
that, whenever there are at least three treatment arms, there exist simple
adaptive designs that universally and strictly dominate non-adaptive completely
randomized trials. This dominance is characterized by a notion called
efficiency exponent, which quantifies a design's statistical efficiency when
the experimental sample is large. Our analysis focuses on the class of batched
arm elimination designs, which progressively eliminate underperforming arms at
pre-specified batch intervals. We characterize simple sufficient conditions
under which these designs universally and strictly dominate completely
randomized trials. These results resolve the second open problem posed in Qin
[2022].

</details>

### [1013] [Benchmark for Antibody Binding Affinity Maturation and Design](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04235)
*Xinyan Zhao,Yi-Ching Tang,Akshita Singh,Victor J Cantu,KwanHo An,Junseok Lee,Adam E Stogsdill,Ashwin Kumar Ramesh,Zhiqiang An,Xiaoqian Jiang,Yejin Kim*

Main category: q-bio.QM

TL;DR: AbBiBench是一个抗体结合亲和力成熟与设计的基准框架，通过评估抗体-抗原复合物的功能单元，系统比较了14种蛋白质模型的性能。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有抗体评估方法仅关注抗体本身或其与天然抗体的相似性，缺乏对功能单元（抗体-抗原复合物）的评估。

Method: AbBiBench通过测量蛋白质模型在抗体-抗原复合物上的似然性来评估抗体设计潜力，并使用9个数据集和155,853个突变抗体进行系统比较。

Result: 结构条件逆折叠模型在亲和力相关性和生成任务中表现最佳。

Conclusion: AbBiBench为开发更有效的功能感知抗体设计模型提供了统一的生物学基础评估框架。

Abstract: We introduce AbBiBench (Antibody Binding Benchmarking), a benchmarking
framework for antibody binding affinity maturation and design. Unlike existing
antibody evaluation strategies that rely on antibody alone and its similarity
to natural ones (e.g., amino acid identity rate, structural RMSD), AbBiBench
considers an antibody-antigen (Ab-Ag) complex as a functional unit and
evaluates the potential of an antibody design binding to given antigen by
measuring protein model's likelihood on the Ab-Ag complex. We first curate,
standardize, and share 9 datasets containing 9 antigens (involving influenza,
anti-lysozyme, HER2, VEGF, integrin, and SARS-CoV-2) and 155,853 heavy chain
mutated antibodies. Using these datasets, we systematically compare 14 protein
models including masked language models, autoregressive language models,
inverse folding models, diffusion-based generative models, and geometric graph
models. The correlation between model likelihood and experimental affinity
values is used to evaluate model performance. Additionally, in a case study to
increase binding affinity of antibody F045-092 to antigen influenza H1N1, we
evaluate the generative power of the top-performing models by sampling a set of
new antibodies binding to the antigen and ranking them based on structural
integrity and biophysical properties of the Ab-Ag complex. As a result,
structure-conditioned inverse folding models outperform others in both affinity
correlation and generation tasks. Overall, AbBiBench provides a unified,
biologically grounded evaluation framework to facilitate the development of
more effective, function-aware antibody design models.

</details>


### [1014] [The Latent Space Hypothesis: Toward Universal Medical Representation Learning](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04515)
*Salil Patel*

Main category: q-bio.QM

TL;DR: 论文提出了一种基于潜在空间假设的框架，将多模态医学数据映射到统一的高维流形中，以支持个性化医疗。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 医学数据多模态且异构，但可能编码了相同的生理状态信息。潜在空间假设旨在将这些数据统一表示，以更好地理解疾病和个体健康状态。

Method: 通过潜在空间假设，将多模态医学数据投影到一个统一的、层次化组织的流形中，利用几何表示（如点、轨迹和向量）建模健康状态、疾病进展和治疗干预。

Result: 该框架揭示了疾病的子轨迹和患者特异性变化方向，为个性化诊断、监测和治疗提供了量化依据。

Conclusion: 潜在空间假设为临床实践提供了新视角，但仍需解决数据偏差、稀缺性、隐私和因果推断等挑战。

Abstract: Medical data range from genomic sequences and retinal photographs to
structured laboratory results and unstructured clinical narratives. Although
these modalities appear disparate, many encode convergent information about a
single underlying physiological state. The Latent Space Hypothesis frames each
observation as a projection of a unified, hierarchically organized manifold --
much like shadows cast by the same three-dimensional object. Within this
learned geometric representation, an individual's health status occupies a
point, disease progression traces a trajectory, and therapeutic intervention
corresponds to a directed vector. Interpreting heterogeneous evidence in a
shared space provides a principled way to re-examine eponymous conditions --
such as Parkinson's or Crohn's -- that often mask multiple pathophysiological
entities and involve broader anatomical domains than once believed. By
revealing sub-trajectories and patient-specific directions of change, the
framework supplies a quantitative rationale for personalised diagnosis,
longitudinal monitoring, and tailored treatment, moving clinical practice away
from grouping by potentially misleading labels toward navigation of each
person's unique trajectory. Challenges remain -- bias amplification, data
scarcity for rare disorders, privacy, and the correlation-causation divide --
but scale-aware encoders, continual learning on longitudinal data streams, and
perturbation-based validation offer plausible paths forward.

</details>


### [1015] [Benchmark for Antibody Binding Affinity Maturation and Design](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04235)
*Xinyan Zhao,Yi-Ching Tang,Akshita Singh,Victor J Cantu,KwanHo An,Junseok Lee,Adam E Stogsdill,Ashwin Kumar Ramesh,Zhiqiang An,Xiaoqian Jiang,Yejin Kim*

Main category: q-bio.QM

TL;DR: AbBiBench是一个抗体结合亲和力成熟与设计的基准框架，通过评估抗体-抗原复合物的功能潜力，为抗体设计提供统一评估标准。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有抗体评估方法仅关注抗体本身或其与天然抗体的相似性，缺乏对抗体-抗原复合物功能的系统性评估。

Method: AbBiBench通过测量蛋白模型在抗体-抗原复合物上的似然性来评估抗体设计潜力，并比较了14种蛋白模型的性能。

Result: 结构条件逆向折叠模型在亲和力相关性和生成任务中表现最佳。

Conclusion: AbBiBench为开发更有效的功能感知抗体设计模型提供了统一的生物学评估框架。

Abstract: We introduce AbBiBench (Antibody Binding Benchmarking), a benchmarking
framework for antibody binding affinity maturation and design. Unlike existing
antibody evaluation strategies that rely on antibody alone and its similarity
to natural ones (e.g., amino acid identity rate, structural RMSD), AbBiBench
considers an antibody-antigen (Ab-Ag) complex as a functional unit and
evaluates the potential of an antibody design binding to given antigen by
measuring protein model's likelihood on the Ab-Ag complex. We first curate,
standardize, and share 9 datasets containing 9 antigens (involving influenza,
anti-lysozyme, HER2, VEGF, integrin, and SARS-CoV-2) and 155,853 heavy chain
mutated antibodies. Using these datasets, we systematically compare 14 protein
models including masked language models, autoregressive language models,
inverse folding models, diffusion-based generative models, and geometric graph
models. The correlation between model likelihood and experimental affinity
values is used to evaluate model performance. Additionally, in a case study to
increase binding affinity of antibody F045-092 to antigen influenza H1N1, we
evaluate the generative power of the top-performing models by sampling a set of
new antibodies binding to the antigen and ranking them based on structural
integrity and biophysical properties of the Ab-Ag complex. As a result,
structure-conditioned inverse folding models outperform others in both affinity
correlation and generation tasks. Overall, AbBiBench provides a unified,
biologically grounded evaluation framework to facilitate the development of
more effective, function-aware antibody design models.

</details>


### [1016] [The Latent Space Hypothesis: Toward Universal Medical Representation Learning](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04515)
*Salil Patel*

Main category: q-bio.QM

TL;DR: 论文提出了一种基于潜在空间假设的框架，将多种医学数据映射到统一的多层次流形中，用于个性化诊断和治疗。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 医学数据多样且复杂，但可能共享相同的生理状态信息。通过潜在空间假设，可以统一这些数据，揭示疾病进展和治疗的几何表示。

Method: 利用潜在空间假设，将异构医学数据映射到共享的几何空间中，通过轨迹和向量表示健康状态、疾病进展和治疗干预。

Result: 框架能够揭示疾病的子轨迹和患者特异性变化方向，为个性化医疗提供定量依据。

Conclusion: 该框架为临床实践提供了新的视角，但仍需解决数据偏见、稀缺性和隐私等挑战。

Abstract: Medical data range from genomic sequences and retinal photographs to
structured laboratory results and unstructured clinical narratives. Although
these modalities appear disparate, many encode convergent information about a
single underlying physiological state. The Latent Space Hypothesis frames each
observation as a projection of a unified, hierarchically organized manifold --
much like shadows cast by the same three-dimensional object. Within this
learned geometric representation, an individual's health status occupies a
point, disease progression traces a trajectory, and therapeutic intervention
corresponds to a directed vector. Interpreting heterogeneous evidence in a
shared space provides a principled way to re-examine eponymous conditions --
such as Parkinson's or Crohn's -- that often mask multiple pathophysiological
entities and involve broader anatomical domains than once believed. By
revealing sub-trajectories and patient-specific directions of change, the
framework supplies a quantitative rationale for personalised diagnosis,
longitudinal monitoring, and tailored treatment, moving clinical practice away
from grouping by potentially misleading labels toward navigation of each
person's unique trajectory. Challenges remain -- bias amplification, data
scarcity for rare disorders, privacy, and the correlation-causation divide --
but scale-aware encoders, continual learning on longitudinal data streams, and
perturbation-based validation offer plausible paths forward.

</details>

### [1017] [A Multi-Dataset Evaluation of Models for Automated Vulnerability Repair](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04987)
*Zanis Ali Khan,Aayush Garg,Qiang Tang*

Main category: cs.SE

TL;DR: 研究探讨了预训练语言模型CodeBERT和CodeT5在自动漏洞修复中的表现，发现CodeBERT在稀疏上下文表现更好，而CodeT5在复杂漏洞模式上更优，但模型在未知数据上泛化能力有限。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 软件漏洞修复是安全关键任务，但现有自动程序修复技术对此研究不足，需探索预训练模型在漏洞修复中的潜力。

Method: 使用CodeBERT和CodeT5在六个数据集和四种语言上进行漏洞修复测试，评估其准确性和泛化能力。

Result: CodeBERT在稀疏上下文表现更好，CodeT5在复杂漏洞模式和扩展性上更优，但模型对未知数据泛化能力有限。

Conclusion: 研究为自动漏洞修复提供了基准，并指出泛化能力的不足，为实际安全应用提供了改进方向。

Abstract: Software vulnerabilities pose significant security threats, requiring
effective mitigation. While Automated Program Repair (APR) has advanced in
fixing general bugs, vulnerability patching, a security-critical aspect of APR
remains underexplored. This study investigates pre-trained language models,
CodeBERT and CodeT5, for automated vulnerability patching across six datasets
and four languages. We evaluate their accuracy and generalization to unknown
vulnerabilities. Results show that while both models face challenges with
fragmented or sparse context, CodeBERT performs comparatively better in such
scenarios, whereas CodeT5 excels in capturing complex vulnerability patterns.
CodeT5 also demonstrates superior scalability. Furthermore, we test fine-tuned
models on both in-distribution (trained) and out-of-distribution (unseen)
datasets. While fine-tuning improves in-distribution performance, models
struggle to generalize to unseen data, highlighting challenges in robust
vulnerability detection. This study benchmarks model performance, identifies
limitations in generalization, and provides actionable insights to advance
automated vulnerability patching for real-world security applications.

</details>


### [1018] [Leveraging Reward Models for Guiding Code Review Comment Generation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04464)
*Oussama Ben Sghaier,Rosalia Tufano,Gabriele Bavota,Houari Sahraoui*

Main category: cs.SE

TL;DR: CoRAL是一个基于深度学习的框架，利用强化学习自动生成代码审查评论，结合语义和实用性奖励机制，优于现有基线方法。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 代码审查耗时且受主观因素影响，自动化技术（尤其是深度学习）可提升效率。

Method: CoRAL采用强化学习框架，通过语义和实用性奖励机制生成评论。

Result: 定量和定性分析显示CoRAL生成的评论优于基线方法。

Conclusion: CoRAL在自动化代码审查评论生成方面表现出高效性和优越性。

Abstract: Code review is a crucial component of modern software development, involving
the evaluation of code quality, providing feedback on potential issues, and
refining the code to address identified problems. Despite these benefits, code
review can be rather time consuming, and influenced by subjectivity and human
factors. For these reasons, techniques to (partially) automate the code review
process have been proposed in the literature. Among those, the ones exploiting
deep learning (DL) are able to tackle the generative aspect of code review, by
commenting on a given code as a human reviewer would do (i.e., comment
generation task) or by automatically implementing code changes required to
address a reviewer's comment (i.e., code refinement task). In this paper, we
introduce CoRAL, a deep learning framework automating review comment generation
by exploiting reinforcement learning with a reward mechanism considering both
the semantics of the generated comments as well as their usefulness as input
for other models automating the code refinement task. The core idea is that if
the DL model generates comments that are semantically similar to the expected
ones or can be successfully implemented by a second model specialized in code
refinement, these comments are likely to be meaningful and useful, thus
deserving a high reward in the reinforcement learning framework. We present
both quantitative and qualitative comparisons between the comments generated by
CoRAL and those produced by the latest baseline techniques, highlighting the
effectiveness and superiority of our approach.

</details>


### [1019] [A Multi-Dataset Evaluation of Models for Automated Vulnerability Repair](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04987)
*Zanis Ali Khan,Aayush Garg,Qiang Tang*

Main category: cs.SE

TL;DR: 该研究探讨了预训练语言模型CodeBERT和CodeT5在自动化漏洞修补中的表现，发现CodeBERT在上下文稀疏时表现更好，而CodeT5在复杂漏洞模式识别和扩展性上更优。但模型在未知数据上的泛化能力有限。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 软件漏洞对安全构成重大威胁，而现有的自动化程序修复（APR）在漏洞修补方面研究不足。

Method: 使用CodeBERT和CodeT5模型在六个数据集和四种语言中进行漏洞修补实验，评估其准确性和泛化能力。

Result: CodeBERT在稀疏上下文表现较好，CodeT5在复杂模式和扩展性上更优，但两者在未知数据上泛化能力有限。

Conclusion: 研究为自动化漏洞修补提供了基准和实用见解，但泛化能力仍需改进。

Abstract: Software vulnerabilities pose significant security threats, requiring
effective mitigation. While Automated Program Repair (APR) has advanced in
fixing general bugs, vulnerability patching, a security-critical aspect of APR
remains underexplored. This study investigates pre-trained language models,
CodeBERT and CodeT5, for automated vulnerability patching across six datasets
and four languages. We evaluate their accuracy and generalization to unknown
vulnerabilities. Results show that while both models face challenges with
fragmented or sparse context, CodeBERT performs comparatively better in such
scenarios, whereas CodeT5 excels in capturing complex vulnerability patterns.
CodeT5 also demonstrates superior scalability. Furthermore, we test fine-tuned
models on both in-distribution (trained) and out-of-distribution (unseen)
datasets. While fine-tuning improves in-distribution performance, models
struggle to generalize to unseen data, highlighting challenges in robust
vulnerability detection. This study benchmarks model performance, identifies
limitations in generalization, and provides actionable insights to advance
automated vulnerability patching for real-world security applications.

</details>


### [1020] [Leveraging Reward Models for Guiding Code Review Comment Generation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.04464)
*Oussama Ben Sghaier,Rosalia Tufano,Gabriele Bavota,Houari Sahraoui*

Main category: cs.SE

TL;DR: CoRAL是一个基于深度学习的框架，利用强化学习自动生成代码审查评论，结合语义和实用性奖励机制，显著优于现有基线方法。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 代码审查耗时且受主观影响，自动化技术（尤其是深度学习）可提高效率。CoRAL旨在生成更有意义的评论，并为后续代码优化任务提供有用输入。

Method: CoRAL采用强化学习框架，奖励机制同时考虑生成评论的语义相似性和对代码优化模型的实用性。

Result: 定量和定性分析表明，CoRAL生成的评论在语义和实用性上优于现有基线方法。

Conclusion: CoRAL通过强化学习生成高质量代码审查评论，为自动化代码审查提供了有效解决方案。

Abstract: Code review is a crucial component of modern software development, involving
the evaluation of code quality, providing feedback on potential issues, and
refining the code to address identified problems. Despite these benefits, code
review can be rather time consuming, and influenced by subjectivity and human
factors. For these reasons, techniques to (partially) automate the code review
process have been proposed in the literature. Among those, the ones exploiting
deep learning (DL) are able to tackle the generative aspect of code review, by
commenting on a given code as a human reviewer would do (i.e., comment
generation task) or by automatically implementing code changes required to
address a reviewer's comment (i.e., code refinement task). In this paper, we
introduce CoRAL, a deep learning framework automating review comment generation
by exploiting reinforcement learning with a reward mechanism considering both
the semantics of the generated comments as well as their usefulness as input
for other models automating the code refinement task. The core idea is that if
the DL model generates comments that are semantically similar to the expected
ones or can be successfully implemented by a second model specialized in code
refinement, these comments are likely to be meaningful and useful, thus
deserving a high reward in the reinforcement learning framework. We present
both quantitative and qualitative comparisons between the comments generated by
CoRAL and those produced by the latest baseline techniques, highlighting the
effectiveness and superiority of our approach.

</details>
